alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 11:29AM EDT until March 31 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Bedford to Shoals. White River from Elliston to Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale. White River at Edwardsport. .Widespread lowland flooding continues along the White River at Elliston to all points downstream...and along the East Fork White River from near Bedford to all points downstream. Moderate flooding has begun at Petersburg...and will continue along the lower White River through Sunday. The crest on the White River will continue along the Knox...Daviess County line through Friday. Flooding will likely last through Friday along Greene County portions of the White River...and through next week along lower portions of the White River. The crest on the East Fork White River will pass Bedford later today with minor flooding continuing for areas downstream through early next week. Rain going into this weekend may extend flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Elliston. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, River Road north of CR 150 W in Greene County is flooded. Low agricultural fields flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 10.2 feet Sunday, April 09. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
